level.heading: Applicability of District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act.
level.text: The provisions of the District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act (§ 2-501 et seq.) shall apply to each proceeding, decision, or other administrative action specified in this unit, unless otherwise specifically provided.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-85
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-2501.01.
